home.title: Lissnify - Mental Health Support & Emotional Wellness Platform
home.description: Connect with compassionate listeners, access mental health resources, and find support in a safe community. Professional emotional support when you need it most.
home.keywords: mental health, emotional support, listeners, therapy, wellness, community, mental health resources

blog.title: Mental Health Resources & Insights | Lissnify Blog
blog.description: Discover articles, guides, and resources to support your mental wellness journey. Expert insights, practical tips, and community stories to help you thrive.
blog.keywords: mental health blog, wellness articles, mental health resources, emotional wellness, self-care tips

login.title: Login to Lissnify | Mental Health Support Platform
login.description: Sign in to access your Lissnify account and connect with compassionate listeners for emotional support and mental wellness resources.
login.keywords: login, mental health platform, emotional support, account access

signup.title: Join Lissnify | Mental Health Support Community
signup.description: Create your Lissnify account to access compassionate listeners, mental health resources, and join a supportive community focused on emotional wellness.
signup.keywords: signup, register, mental health community, emotional support, join platform

listener.title: Become a Listener | Lissnify Mental Health Platform
listener.description: Share your light and become a supportive listener. Offer empathy and guidance based on your lived experience to help others feel less alone.
listener.keywords: become listener, mental health support, emotional guidance, volunteer, help others

listeners.title: Find a Listener | Lissnify Mental Health Support
listeners.description: Connect with compassionate listeners by category. Find the right emotional support for your specific needs and mental wellness journey.
listeners.keywords: find listener, mental health support, emotional guidance, listener categories, support matching

listener-category.title: {{categoryName}} Listeners | Lissnify Mental Health Support
listener-category.description: Connect with experienced {{categoryName}} listeners who understand your challenges and can provide compassionate emotional support.
listener-category.keywords: {{categoryName}} support, mental health listeners, emotional guidance, {{categoryName}} help

listener-profile.title: {{listenerName}} | {{categoryName}} Listener | Lissnify
listener-profile.description: Connect with {{listenerName}}, a compassionate {{categoryName}} listener ready to provide emotional support and guidance.
listener-profile.keywords: {{listenerName}}, {{categoryName}} listener, emotional support, mental health guidance

seeker.title: Find Support | Lissnify Mental Health Platform
seeker.description: Access compassionate listeners and mental health resources tailored to your needs. Find emotional support and guidance on your wellness journey.
seeker.keywords: mental health support, emotional guidance, seeker, find help, wellness resources

community.title: Mental Health Community | Lissnify Support Forum
community.description: Join our supportive mental health community. Share experiences, find understanding, and connect with others on similar wellness journeys.
community.keywords: mental health community, support forum, peer support, wellness community, emotional support

community-topic.title: {{topicName}} Discussion | Lissnify Community
community-topic.description: Join the conversation about {{topicName}} in our supportive mental health community. Share experiences and find understanding.
community-topic.keywords: {{topicName}}, mental health discussion, community support, peer support

help.title: Help Center | Lissnify Support & FAQ
help.description: Get help with Lissnify. Find answers to common questions, learn how to use our platform, and access support resources.
help.keywords: help center, FAQ, support, platform guide, Lissnify help

crisis.title: Crisis Support Resources | Lissnify Emergency Help
crisis.description: Immediate mental health crisis support resources. Find emergency helplines, crisis intervention services, and urgent mental health support.
crisis.keywords: crisis support, emergency mental health, suicide prevention, crisis intervention, urgent help

about.title: About Lissnify | Mental Health Support Platform
about.description: Learn about Lissnify's mission to provide accessible mental health support through compassionate listeners and community resources.
about.keywords: about Lissnify, mental health platform, mission, compassionate support, accessible therapy

privacy.title: Privacy Policy | Lissnify Mental Health Platform
privacy.description: Learn how Lissnify protects your privacy and handles your personal information in our mental health support platform.
privacy.keywords: privacy policy, data protection, mental health privacy, personal information

terms.title: Terms of Service | Lissnify Mental Health Platform
terms.description: Read Lissnify's terms of service and user agreement for our mental health support and community platform.
terms.keywords: terms of service, user agreement, platform terms, mental health platform rules

dashboard-seeker.title: Seeker Dashboard | Lissnify Mental Health Platform
dashboard-seeker.description: Access your personal dashboard to connect with listeners, track your wellness journey, and manage your mental health support.
dashboard-seeker.keywords: seeker dashboard, mental health tracking, listener connections, wellness journey

dashboard-listener.title: Listener Dashboard | Lissnify Mental Health Platform
dashboard-listener.description: Manage your listener profile, connect with seekers, and track your impact in providing mental health support to the community.
dashboard-listener.keywords: listener dashboard, mental health support, seeker connections, listener profile

chats.title: Chats | Lissnify Mental Health Support
chats.description: Access your ongoing conversations with listeners and seekers. Continue your mental health support journey through secure messaging.
chats.keywords: mental health chats, listener conversations, support messaging, emotional support chat

notifications.title: Notifications | Lissnify Mental Health Platform
notifications.description: Stay updated with your mental health support activities, community updates, and important platform notifications.
notifications.keywords: notifications, mental health updates, platform alerts, support reminders

demo.title: Platform Demo | Lissnify Mental Health Support
demo.description: Experience Lissnify's mental health support platform through our interactive demo. See how listeners and seekers connect.
demo.keywords: platform demo, mental health demo, Lissnify trial, support platform preview

support-category.title: {{categoryName}} Support | Lissnify Mental Health
support-category.description: Find specialized support for {{categoryName}} challenges. Connect with listeners who understand your specific mental health needs.
support-category.keywords: {{categoryName}} support, mental health help, specialized guidance, emotional support

default.title: Lissnify - Mental Health Support & Emotional Wellness
default.description: Connect with compassionate listeners and access mental health resources for your emotional wellness journey.
